snippet.title: Real Madrid vs. Bayern Munich preview: Likely better than the other Champions League tie
snippet.description:
Real Madrid vs. Bayern Munich preview: Likely better than the other Champions League tie by Jack Sargeant on Apr 22 2014, 5:23p
The second Champions League semifinal kicks off at the Bernabéu on Wednesday, with Real Madrid hosting reigning champions Bayern Munich.

snippet.title: Bayern Munich vs. Kaiserslautern: Final score 5-1, Bayern set up BVB final with comfortable win
snippet.description:
Bayern Munich vs. Kaiserslautern: Final score 5-1, Bayern set up BVB final with comfortable win by Jack Sargeant on Apr 16 2014, 4:23p
Bayern Munich will play Borussia Dortmund in the final of the DFB-Pokal after easing past Kaiserslautern in Wednesday's semifinal.

snippet.title: Bayern Munich vs. Kaiserslautern: Preview, TV schedule and how to watch online
snippet.description:
Bayern Munich vs. Kaiserslautern: Preview, TV schedule and how to watch online by Jack Sargeant on Apr 16 2014, 8:00a
Second-tier Kaiserslautern haven't won away at Bayern since 1997, though the Bavarians' recent struggles may give the underdogs some slight hope of sneaking into the DFB-Pokal final.

snippet.title: Obvious substitutions save Bayern Munich and Barcelona
snippet.description:
Obvious substitutions save Bayern Munich and Barcelona by Kevin McCauley on Apr 2 2014, 12:09p
Manchester United and Atlético Madrid took advantage of poor lineup decisions by their opponents' managers, but Gerardo Martino and Pep Guardiola were both able to correct their initial mistakes.

snippet.title: Bayern Munich vs. Arsenal, 2014 UEFA Champions League: Bavarians hang on
snippet.description:
Bayern Munich vs. Arsenal, 2014 UEFA Champions League: Bavarians hang on by Kevin McCauley on Mar 11 2014, 3:01p
Despite having an easier task than last year, Arsenal were less up for it. They could only manage a draw away to Bayern Munich and have exited the Champions League.

snippet.title: Bayern Munich vs. Arsenal: Last year leaves Gunners a glimmer of hope
snippet.description:
Bayern Munich vs. Arsenal: Last year leaves Gunners a glimmer of hope by Kevin McCauley on Mar 10 2014, 5:06p
No one expects Arsenal to pull off a comeback on Tuesday, nor should they. But they've come close before, and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain looks set to have a moment any 'big' game now.

snippet.title: Switzerland vs. Croatia: Preview
snippet.description:
Switzerland vs. Croatia: Preview by Jack Sargeant on Mar 5 2014, 3:00a
Switzerland and Croatia meet in a clash of World Cup dark horses on Wednesday.

snippet.title: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs. Bayern Munich: Preview and TV schedule
snippet.description:
Borussia Mönchengladbach vs. Bayern Munich: Preview and TV schedule by Jack Sargeant on Jan 24 2014, 3:04a
The Bundesliga returns with a bang as Borussia Mönchengladbach host Bayern Munich on Friday.

snippet.title: UEFA 2014 World Cup qualifying playoffs: Ronaldo fires Portugal to first leg win
snippet.description:
UEFA 2014 World Cup qualifying playoffs: Ronaldo fires Portugal to first leg win by Kevin McCauley on Nov 15 2013, 8:04a
Cristiano Ronaldo got the best of Zlatan Ibrahimovic in the first leg of their World Cup playoffs, while 10-man Iceland held on for a draw.

snippet.title: Viktoria Plzen vs. Bayern Munich: Preview and TV schedule
snippet.description:
Viktoria Plzen vs. Bayern Munich: Preview and TV schedule by Jack Sargeant on Nov 5 2013, 3:00a
Bayern Munich should maintain their perfect record in this season's Champions League with a win against Viktoria Plzen on Tuesday.
